items.title: 4 microcap stocks that should be on your watchlist for 2025
items.description: While each of these microcap stocks carries inherent risks, the current technical setup supported by the Heikin Ashi Multi-Time Frame alignment signals a potential for bullish breakouts.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade IndoStar Capital, Cyient, Som Distilleries, HDFC Life Insurance, Lodha, Dhanuka Agritech and others on May 26?
items.description: The market is expected to continue rangebound trading until the index decisively surpasses and sustains above the high of the month of May. Below are some short-term trading ideas to consider.
